name: Cuda/OpenCL Forensic Tools
body: Develop scripts to perform simple forensic functions like image, overwrite, hash, and search. The core of the script is Python Cuda/OpenCL. Initially the goal is to test the performance of the concept. If performance shows value the next step would be to develop scripts to perform each function.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
